Yep. Straight Shot is a basic, so is Rat Trap. Even when Rat Trap
became transmetal and despite the fact that he was listed as a Deluxe,
in the show he never actually grew. So he would be between 5 and 6
feet tall. The show bible says 5'

However having said that I am instituting something that the show did
but that we forgot.

BW's characters do not size change.

For instance Rat Trap was about 5 feet tall as a robot and he turned
into a rat of approximately the same size. If you noticed in the
cartoon he is much larger than your average rat. Transmetal  Megatron
was about 10 feet tall and he turned into a 10 tall T-rex, which is
much smaller than the real world counter parts.

What that means is that Rat Trap will not be small enough to climb
inside walls or Windlord as he is a Deluxe size no matter if robot or
bird (approximate 7' or so).

Anyways, I know we allowed it before, but I am attempting to keep us
as close to the Beast Wars feel of things as is possible. This is just
food for thought as things get more intense later.

- Preston
